ISSUE.TITLE: PayPal Standard to support additional fees in both forms of fixed fee and fee by percentage
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.5 PayPal is charging merchants 3.9% of Order Total + MYR 2 for each transaction. Naturally, merchants would want to push this expense to the customers. The current PayPal Standard plugin is only able to handle additional fee of either a fixed amount or fee by a certain percentage, but not both. Here's a suggestion to support both.
